targets.query:
latestRecord = from(bucket: "vechain")
  |> range(start: 2015-01-01T00:00:00Z, stop: 2100-01-01T00:00:00Z)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "individual_validators")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "weight")
  |> group()
  |> last()
  |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)

latestTime = latestRecord._time

from(bucket: "vechain")
  |> range(start: latestTime)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "individual_validators")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["status"] == "active")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "weight")
  |> group()
  |> sum(column: "_value")

latestRecord = from(bucket: "vechain")
  |> range(start: 2015-01-01T00:00:00Z, stop: 2100-01-01T00:00:00Z)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "individual_validators")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "weight")
  |> group()
  |> last()
  |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)

latestTime = latestRecord._time

sum = from(bucket: "vechain")
  |> range(start: latestTime)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "individual_validators")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["status"] == "active")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "weight")
  |> group()
  |> sum(column: "_value")
  |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)

from(bucket: "vechain")
  |> range(start: latestTime)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "individual_validators")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["status"] == "active")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "weight")
  |> group()
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "staker"])
  |> sort(columns:["_value"], desc: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with staker: "Node - " + r.staker}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with percent: float(v: r._value) * 100.0 / float(v: sum._value)}))
  |> drop(columns: ["_value"])
  |> sort(columns: ["percent"], desc: true)

latestRecord = from(bucket: "vechain")
  |> range(start: 2015-01-01T00:00:00Z, stop: 2100-01-01T00:00:00Z)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "individual_validators")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "weight")
  |> group()
  |> last()
  |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)

latestTime = latestRecord._time

  |> range(start: latestTime)

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["status"] == "active")

  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "staker"])
  |> sort(columns:["_value"], desc: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with staker: "Node - " + r.staker}))

  |> range(start: latestTime)

latestRecord = from(bucket: "vechain")
  |> range(start: 2015-01-01T00:00:00Z, stop: 2100-01-01T00:00:00Z)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "individual_validators")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "staked_amount")
